creator: daniel.santos@pobox.com
text:
Under the section
Building mod_jk on Unix
 |
 +-configure arguments
    |
    +-Examples of configure use
       |
       +-Apache 2.0 build with JNI support

The argument "--with-apxs=/opt/apache2/bin/apxs" should be
"--with-apxs2=/opt/apache2/bin/apxs" (without the quotes).

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
OK, I've fixed this in CVS.  The change will be visible on the web site with 
the next release.  Thanks for brining this to our attention.
